title: Ticket #5016: add gangliad support for windows and macos
description:
Currently condor_gangliad only compiles on Linux. As gmetric exists for Windows and Mac, there is really no reason that gangliad cannot be supported on these platforms via gmetric updating (aka without libganglia support).

Assuming that condor_gangliad will also become the basis for monitoring for a new CondorView, it becomes even more desirable to build it on Windows and Mac.
